Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 416 Pedestrians

416.01Right of way in crosswalk.

416.02Right of way of blind person.

416.03Crossing roadway outside crosswalk; diagonal crossings at intersections.

416.04Moving upon right half of crosswalk.

416.05Walking along highways.

416.06Use of highway for soliciting; riding on outside of vehicle.

416.07On bridges or railroad crossings.

416.08Yielding to public safety vehicle.

416.09Right of way on sidewalk.

416.10Walking on highway while under the influence.

416.11Persons operating motorized wheelchairs.

416.12Electric personal assistive mobility devices.

CROSS REFERENCES

See section histories for similar State law

Pedestrians prohibited on freeways - see TRAF. 412.05

Obedience to traffic control devices - see TRAF. 414.01

Pedestrian control signals - see TRAF. 414.05

Opening doors on side available to traffic - see TRAF. 452.07
